title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Text Signal-Based Learning for Team Collaboration Visualization Map Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of group dynamics and socioscientific influence, along with experience using digital tools
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can extract key concepts from given scientific texts and design team-based visualization maps.
Learners can analyze and comparatively explain differences in collaborative outputs based on text signals (hyperlinks/highlights).
Learners can improve collaborative visualization maps based on formative assessment feedback and evaluate their similarity to expert models.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
